original: 「我奉主公命令，督兵破曹，若有言降者必斬！現在兩軍相敵之際，膽敢出此言，怠慢軍心，不將你斬首，難以服眾！」
text: "I am ordered by the lord, the superintendent breaks Cao, and if there is a word, I must cut it! Now when the two armies are facing each other, dare to say this and neglect the military spirit. If you don't behead you, it is difficult to convince the crowd!"
